metadata.title: CVE-2011-2907 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Terascale Open-Source Resource and Queue Manager (aka TORQUE ResourceManager) 3.0.1 and earlier allows remote attackers to bypass host-basedauthentication and submit arbitrary jobs via a modified PBS_O_HOST variableto the qsub program.

criterions.comment: torque: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
